0.5.name: wordpress/login-logo-customization
0.5.description:
Using this small plugin you'll be able to change:

  • Wp-admin
  • Wp-login
  • register

Logo

You need to insert your custom logo URL and Enable the Function

In the "0.5" Version you will also able to change the Default "Wp-admin" Link (to wordpress.org) with your Own Home Page Link, simply setting the custom url from the dropdown menu.

Edit Your Wp-login background

You do not need to do any other change.

  • Insert Your Blog's Review for Free into BlogAdvice.org; No registration Needed
